Title: Includes certain willful representations by physicians, physician's assistants, and specialist's assistants
Summary: Includes certain willful representations made by physicians, physician's assistants, and specialist's assistants to patients and clients, or relating to patients' and clients' private health information, as professional misconduct.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to professional misconduct by physicians, physician's assistants, and specialist's assistants
